articles.description: Forty years after it flopped in the UK, Don’t Stop Believin’ by Journey has reaped its own reward. The San Francisco rock band could not have foreseen that the message in the lyrics — which espouse never giving up in the face of adversity — would prove a usef…
articles.content:
Forty years after it flopped in the UK, Dont Stop Believin by Journey has reaped its own reward.
